scripts.info.txt: bash -c "TZ=UTC steamctl depot info --app 629910 --depot 629911 --branch public | tail --lines=+2 | tee steam-depot-info-new.txt"
scripts.info.txt:mv: bash -c "mv --force --no-target-directory steam-depot-info.txt steam-depot-info-old.txt && mv --force --no-target-directory steam-depot-info-new.txt steam-depot-info.txt"
scripts.fetch:query: bash -c "yarn info.txt && diff steam-depot-info.txt steam-depot-info-new.txt && echo \"assets-dl is up to date.\""
scripts.fetch:force: bash -c "mkdir -p ${FETCH_DIR:-dist} && cd ${FETCH_DIR:-dist} && steamctl depot download --app 629910 --depot 629911 --branch public "
